website_summaries.verdict: Timberland Nellie women's boots are the perfect blend of rugged and feminine. Ready to be matched with everything from skirts to ripped jeans.
pros: Seam-sealed waterproof construction allows you to wear these boots all year long
Padded collars and EVA cushioned midsole add comfort
Rustproof hardware.Removable anti-fatigue footbeds provide all-day support
cons: The tongue of the shoe tends to rub on ankles

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed; I love the way the look
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the way these boots looked, but I have to agree with the reviewers who said they are uncomfortable. I ordered a half size up as the company advised, and the tongue of the right shoe dug into my ankle so bad I didn’t even try to wear them because I knew it would be terribly uncomfortable (and maybe impossible) to break them in. Also, as many stated, the shoe laces are way to short to even tie. My regular shoe size is 7B and these were 7.5C-D. Have to send them back; my first Amazon return after hundreds of items. Very disappointed; I love the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzin'

customer_reviews.title: This was a SPITE purchase
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I bought these for spite. Our First Lady wore these boots to a combat zone and was mocked for it. These boots, are similar to combat boots. I know because I was deployed for 8 years to a combat zone. Also, these boots are made in America. So I was very happy the media made a joke out of our FLOTUS as it reminded me that these are very very good boots! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah White

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go for these after my Merrell's were discontinued. Figured I would give them a shot, since they were half the price. What a mistake... The left foot is fine, but the right one is extremely uncomfortable. I never had this issue with other pairs, so I am left to conclude that I got a bat batch of boots that are slightly different from one another. I would not expect something like this from timberland. Waste of money, they are simply unusable. The only reason I gave them 2 stars is because they look cute, and they are waterproof as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not much cushion in the insole
customer_reviews.text: Overall the boot appeared to be well made with good quality materials. They were attractive. However, I was buying them to be an actual work type boot to wear around the farm. I have a pair of timberland boat shoes that I absolutely LOVE and was really hoping to love these boots as well. The insole was kind of hard and didn't seem to have much support in the arch. I usually have to wear arch supports in my shoes so putting them in these boots was expected and they were more comfortable for me after doing so, but ultimately I decided the boots were not as comfortable as another pair I ordered through prime wardrobe so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Mismatch (May Be Counterfeit) Boots
customer_reviews.text: Oh My! I don't usually post many reviews, so I'll try to be brief. I opened the box to wrap the boots as a gift for the holidays and there were two variations to the color "wheat"! The left foot and the right foot are NOT the same COLOR! The left foot is darker and also does not feel as heavy in weight than the right foot. The left foot truly looks counterfeit. I bought these boots in October and when I put the other pair next to these, there is a noticeable difference. I am about to call Amazon. This is ridiculous.....and not that it may matter, but this package arrived with a damaged box inside!
customer_reviews.author: M Teal

customer_reviews.title: Cute Boots But Hurt Ankles!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these boots....ordered my regular 7-1/2 size and they delivered in 2 days. Fit true to size and comfortable in the foot with regular socks (order a 1/2 size up if you'll be wearing thick socks with these regularly). HOWEVER, I tried these on 3 separate times and walked around the living room (carpeted) for a few minutes each time. I know Timberland makes sturdy, quality boots BUT the material is stiff/hard and my ankles were SO SORE after each time (even with the "leather padding trim"), particularly from the tongues stabbing the front of my ankles. I just CANNOT wear these......have no choice but to return! DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, but not comfy....
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Fit as expected. I usually wear a 9, but depending on manufacturer I might go down to an 8 1/2. The 9 fit just fine in length and width. Several reviews said these were super comfy straight out the box. I found them super stiff out of the box. (To the point I took them off and looked for a hidden piece of cardboard packing inside). The footbed is nothing to brag about. Yes the arch is fine, but the softness is not there for all day wear. So, Plan to purchase a separate insole for comfort. But great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Horsemom90

customer_reviews.title: They look good but feel terrible
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, I have problems with bunions and have been searching for a little black boot to wear with skinny jeans that is wide enough in the toe portion. I've had other timberland hiking boots before and hoped that this would be the solution as many dress boits are way too narrow. I even ordered them in wide only to find they are still too narrow! This has nothing to do with length, even wearing thin socks the wide boot fits like a normal width boot. It's sad because they do look really good, like you could wear them on the trail or to the office. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, waterproof bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair to use as work boots. Each pair lasted several years, which is amazing considering how I beat them up. I stand in them for hours at a time and their support and comfort are great. They are truly waterproof, as I frequently have to walk through puddles and snow. The tread provides great traction on ice. While I do have a different pair I wear for heavy snow and very low temps, these get me through all but the worst days.
customer_reviews.author: CKS

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am a die-hard Timberland fan, falling in love with the brand while overseas. The selection is vast and stylish and extremely comfortable. Until I bought these. The fit is still perfect, the material is exceptional and top quality. But they are also extremely heavy. I purchased these boots because my previous pair died after ten years of wear. My other pair was smooth leather and these are suede. Otherwise, visually, they are identical. Not sure why the manufacturing has changed but for three other pairs of Timberland's I own, these are easily twice as heavy. Feel like a lumberjack trudging down the road.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect but....
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this purchase! I love the color - subtle pink, not too loud or not too dull either. Perfect to pair with jeans or shorts. The only reason I did not give it five stars is the tongue is touching and rubbing a part of my foot that can get irritated. You have to wear at least an ankle length pair of socks to avoid this. I was able to be creative by wearing different colors of socks to highlight the shoes. The shoelace is a bit short but you can still double tie to void untying too much.
customer_reviews.author: Snellville Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, but size down half a size.
customer_reviews.text: With this boot being wide, you don't need to size up like traditional shoes. And these boots are truly wide. I can wear thick socks with them and still feel comfortable. My only complaints are that I didn't know from reviews that I could size down, so they're a hair big in length on me. That tongue aggravates me and I hate that it's attached. But beyond that I love them and I plan to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Sol Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I think these boots are super cute and I'm so glad they fit! My favorite brand of shoes is Oboz, they fit great, are super supportive but they are hiking shoe and can't really "dress-up" an outfit. I have a hard time finding boots that fit because I have slightly wider feet. I first ordered a size 8.5W, the length was great but they were too tight for me. I exchanged them for a 9W, the length is a little too long but do-able and the width is great! I don't care for the shoe laces (hard to tie) but I plan on ordering ribbon laces to dress them up. So excited to have cute boots again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ima Momi

customer_reviews.title: A Good Boot for Winter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots to navigate Virginia winters- cold, wet and snowy. I like the fit. I did get 1/2 size larger to wear with thick socks. I’ve had them about a week- they are comfortable even after several hours of wear. Some reviewers mentioned the tongue being too stiff and rubbing but that disappeared after I wore them several times. I do hate the laces- too stiff, too short. I will be replacing those.
customer_reviews.author: Tita Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Usually I buy the juniors size 6 this time I bought the ladies eight wide and they fit too snug they come with an artificial innersoul which really made the shoe even smaller, there’s something on the top of the shoe that’s gouging into my big toe ,really disappointed I guess I’ll have to break them in some more that didn’t happen with the youth sizes
customer_reviews.author: Tlc3lfd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought for outdoor work in wet conditions. These boots are comfy for all day outside on all terrain and in rainy conditions. Just what I’d hoped for! People were concerned about the tongue of the boot rubbing against their ankle. I was afraid I’d need taller socks for this, but it hasn’t been a problem. I wear “no show” bootie socks in a synthetic material to wick away sweat moisture. These work well for me!
customer_reviews.author: FencePpl

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for waterproof boots to were in rainy weather. Will use them for short leisure hikes. 2-5 miles in the woods. I am not a serious hiker, so I can’t speak for the durability of the boots for long rough terrain hikes. They are cute with jeans. I like everything about them but wish they were a little lighter. The are great for my purposes. Also to note I ordered 2 other pairs of timberline before I took a third chance and ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlyn

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say that these are my favorite go to boots in the cooler weather months! They are so comfortable. I always have trouble with boots being too heavy, tight, clunky, and uncomfortable. These boots are roomy, fit well and look good dressed up or dressed down. I've always LOVED Timberland and have owned several pairs. These are my favorite so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy boot.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a pair of timberland boots. These are better than expected. I have tree trunks for legs, and my concern was I thought they may be to tight, they weren't. These boots are comfy and waterproof. Just what I need for Florida rainy season. These boots don't have much in arch support, but unless you have wide feet, there is room for inserts.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good..
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good... The fit is weird. My size is 35-36 women's. I got size 5.5 and it was pretty huge so I had to get size 5 from a different website because Amazon doesn't carry them... Anyway size 5 was MUCH smaller compared to the 5.5 so I had to choose between too small and too big. :( The shoes are pretty heavy and my feet hurt after walking around in them for a few hours. Hope it will get better.
customer_reviews.author: xelakitten

customer_reviews.title: Hurt too much to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these boots were so cute, but they were very uncomfortable. The tongue was so stiff that it cut into my foot, even with thick socks on. I'm too old (almost 60) to have to "break in" shoes like the other reviews I've seen. If a shoe/boot isn't comfortable when I wear it, forget it! Life is too short to wear something that hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Chaigirl01

customer_reviews.title: My kid wears 'em NOW!
customer_reviews.text: After exchanging, very easily, for a half size smaller, they're the perfect fit for my 14 yo daughter. She has flat feet and likes the ankle support. They keep her feet warm and dry walking to and from her school bus. She claims they're very comfortable. I used to wear Timbs, so I'm not surprised. You pay a bit more, but you get really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diggity™

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. My only complaint was the shoe laces were not as long as I like, because I like to double knot them. I went to Wal-Mart and bought a pair of 45 inch black laces and they are perfect. I have been wearing them in the snow when I shovel and they keep my feet dry. Plus, I can wear them all day at work and they are very comfortable. The last time I bought these shoes, they lasted me 15 years. For that amount of time, I don't mind paying more.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B

customer_reviews.title: Timberland please get it together
customer_reviews.text: Timberland boots have always been my go to for comfort and durability. However, these boots hurt my feet. They were scuffed on the toes, which is understandable due to the quality of the material. The tongue should be padded to protect the top of the foot from irritation. There're also very difficult to put on. However, I gave them 3 stars because Timberland used to be a great boot and I'm hoping they will again.
customer_reviews.author: GEG

customer_reviews.title: Regular width is narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot. Problem for me is that it is very narrow. I usually wear a 6 1/2 regular width. But this was painful as soon as I got it on. I went ahead and ordered the wide in this boot and it fits much better. That is my only problem. Otherwise nice looking and well made. If you have a narrow fit this should work great.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: #1 go-to shoe
customer_reviews.text: My go-to shoe for many occasions and all 4 seasons. Looks great with skinny jeans, relaxed baggy pants, and bootcut pants. Runs a bit large but bought thicker socks to fix that problem. Nellie (ankle height) is what I bought and I find it most attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: STURDY BOOT
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 9, but my old pair of Timberland boots were Wide, so I ordered these in 9W. A little snug in the width by the toes, and a little loose in the width by the heel. But well made and waterproof. Wish the soles came in white like my old Timberlands.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraLMM

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and fit is too large
customer_reviews.text: These boots look very nice, but they are too big, too heavy and really hurt my feet. If you have a high arch, you will need to add arch supports. I normally wear a size 6 and could have used a size 5 in these boots. I would love to return them but it took me too long to determine that they boots just don't fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Romo

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed wife size isn’t wide at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: They look nice I got the wide boots I wear an 8.5 wide I couldn’t even get my foot in them... so very annoyed I spent money for them. I bought a different pair of tims for my boyfriend got him the wide and they fit him perfectly. Ugh I waited for them and am so disappointed:( I have not had tims since I was younger so excited for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cole

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I can not recommend
customer_reviews.text: In looking at the blue ones I believed that they were fur lined or at least had some kind of lining. I said fits as expected but the others options didn't fit either. They are clunky and not cushioned at all. I had to purchase new shoe laces because the original ones were too short and didn't stay tied. I am not returning them because I've already worn them outside and scuffed the toes trying to get my feet comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Holzbaur

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I backpacked Europe for 4 months and since I was limited on packing space, I wanted to bring only one pair of shoes that were versatile and fashionable. I hit the jackpot with these shoes. They’re not for heavy-duty hiking or outdoor recreation, but they did the job for me. I ran to catch trains, walked through cities, danced at nightclubs, hiked mountains, traveled through snow, rain, and black ice. They were comfortable, fashionable, and durable. I highly recommend these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable but not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Timberlands when winter and spring showers were coming in. I use my bike on campus to quickly get out of the rain, but these boots are pretty bulky to be pedaling or going up stairs. I’d find myself slightly tripping or hitting something, underestimating my steps. They look super cute, though! I guess if you’re looking to buy these, they should be for fashion and not for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen David

customer_reviews.title: True to fit. Awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. I've never bought shoes online before because I'm always afraid they won't for right but these fit perfectly. I work at a carwash and was sick and tired of having soaking wet and freezing feet every night after work. I seriously love these. And they look good too. My only complaint is the tongue of the shoe can be kind of uncomfortable and the laces are really short.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: OK, but
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sole suitable for orthotics. These are fully molded with fake stitching - can't tell from the pics. I had to have the orthotics put inside which is not as comfortable. They're nice shoes, but all my previous Timberlands could be altered and these can't.
customer_reviews.author: Linda O

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Brand Reliable Boots Reliable Purchase WILL BUY again!
customer_reviews.text: Reliable Brand Reliable Boots Reliable Purchase WILL BUY again! A gift for my daughter who loves these boots. She will probably get 5 years out of them as she did the last pair she had. Would recommend for 'dressy sport look,' as well as work boots!
customer_reviews.author: SadieBookLady14

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: These boots very comfortable and very well made! I'm sometimes between a 9.5-10 (26.5 cm) and 10 fit well. They are waterproof. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Terrific style, terrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different pairs, one in black the other blue (which was more black than blue). Both pairs are very stylish, but the "blue" pair were too large in the heel, and the tongue on the black pair dug into my skin each time I took a step. They were both the same size. I have other Timberlands and ordered my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: They are not real Tims. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's fake. Poor quality. Stiching is coming apart, just received these today. No eyelet tag, no genuine box, the bottom of the she is a cheap rubber and the bottom of the shoe already shows signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: While I really wanted to love this boot, and ordered THREE different sizes (10, 9.5, and 9.5W) to try to get it to work, it was always incredibly uncomfortable and oddly-fitting. I'm grateful for Amazon's free returns, because all three pairs had to go back :(
customer_reviews.author: Kari Aytch

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these boots. At first they bothered my ankles a little bit but they softened up after a couple wears. I wore these while hiking the Highlands in Scotland and had no problems. They clean up well and are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used them to walk long distances while on vacations and they really feel comfortable and supporting your feet. They are warm, feel safe while walking in the snow and overall are very classic and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my wide foot
customer_reviews.text: These boots were beautiful and I really wanted to like them but they were so stiff and my foot pain was instantaneous. So, I unfortunately had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia S McMillan

customer_reviews.title: A Little Stiff But Getting Better
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a short boot by Timberland to replace a pair I wore for 15-20 years. I wish these were softer leather as they are pretty stiff. They seem to be stretching a little every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Love these lower rise boots
customer_reviews.text: I wear these constantly in fall and winter, but not with a lot of snow. I tend to baby my Timberlands. I wear them with jeans and even Nike tights. They are my favorite boots. Since I am short, I love that they have the lower rise boots now. Much more comfortable design.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot strange fit.
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit a little narrow in the toe box as they always have. Just the shape of the lowered upper across the toe causes this problem. The design & color are great and them being waterproof is also a great thing especially in Midwest winters. The wider D boot is probably a truer fit in the toe box but then the heel may be too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Griffin

customer_reviews.title: but when I got them I was pretty disappointed. The shoe laces weren't all that
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these shoes, but when I got them I was pretty disappointed. The shoe laces weren't all that, and I ordered a wide and sized up but there is no way that these were wides... Or even the size below what I ordered. I think the shoe itself was cute, and seemed high quality, but ultimately I decided to return them. If you have narrow feet/don't wear insoles, you'd probably be better off!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Great experience.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect online purchase. On time delivery. Brand new product. Very happy with everything.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: The best boots and/or shoes I've bought in many years
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I'm on my feet a lot in the office and they are really comfortable. Waterproof, too. And they look nice, as well; I've gotten multiple compliments. Thinking of buying them in brown. I am so pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Practical and Quality

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute!! Beautiful shade of pink, just lovely! My husband has always worn timberland boots and they have lasted for years. I am getting so many compliments on them. I'm thinking of buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Classic look I remember!
customer_reviews.text: My partner had these shoes years ago and I always wondered if they were made in women's sizes. Very pleased to have found them here on Amazon. I am enjoying these very much and get a lot of compliments as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots. Look and quality were everything I wanted. Too small, by at least half a size. I'm a 9.5/10 depending on the shoe and this 10 was way too small. Not sure if Tims run small but they don't have this shoe in a women's 11. I'm hoping, because they're leather, that shoe stretchers will help.* *Update - Using a combination of rubbing alcohol and water spray, steam, and wooden shoe stretchers for a week, I was able to stretch the shoes to be more comfortable. Still too much work for a shoe that is labeled to be my size but at least I get to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Sciacci

customer_reviews.title: These are OK..not great!!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews that stated that the boots run small are correct, I wear 8.5 W and I needed a 9 W. Also the boots are very stiff. I presume because of the waterproofing. I have not worn them long enough to "break them in", but I assume that will happen. If I had paid full price for them they would be going back. Since I got them at a reduced price I can live with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dubbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe - but Wide is not actually Wide...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I can't walk distance in them at all, so I use them solely for horseback riding. I ordered wide, I received wide but they are certainly NOT wide. My feet are (normally) just slightly wider than the average size shoe and these boots feel like a regular width shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Zelena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box and picked up the shoes, I didn't think I would like it because it was heavy. When I put it on, it felt really comfortable and didn't feel as heavy.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: Heavy/too stiff
customer_reviews.text: These boots were very heavy and clunky. The upper part never “broke in” to become more flexible/comfortable. I did NOT have them tied too tightly. The leather is not soft. I returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: They are just as great as I remembered
customer_reviews.text: I had these boots (or very similar) years ago and lost one. I've been pining away for a new pair ever since, and our recent cold weather/snow prompted me to order again. They are just as great as I remembered! Very warm, comfortable, good traction, and I just love the color. They fit very true to size, so order what you normally wear. I tend to order a half size up, but these fit perfectly even with thicker socks on.
customer_reviews.author: ChezMoi

customer_reviews.title: If you have warn tims before you have a little extra room however with winter socks they fit perfect. I love the
customer_reviews.text: Decent Tims. If you have warn tims before you have a little extra room however with winter socks they fit perfect. I love the. Wish they were steel toe. I recommend spraying with boot protector before wearing to keep them looking nice
customer_reviews.author: Ben verna

customer_reviews.title: Timberland wide boots!! only available at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful boot that was shipped quickly and the price was fair but I will be returning it. I ordered both the wheat and blue, thought I would like the blue better but it turns out that I thought the wheat was a better option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Requires only slight breaking-in and looks sharp. Purchased a wide for wider feet and it's just a wee bit on the large side, so if you usually purchase wide, you may not need to purchase wide in these. Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: It took at least one month to work my foot to feel comfortable in this boot. They were a little tight across the widest part of my foot, but after wearing them a while they are Perfect! I wouldn't give them up for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced than timberland outlet
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, I just went to the outlet, they were selling it for 20 dollars less. I like the shoe, and I am going to keep it. It was just the pice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Z. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great Tims
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, great fit, laces are NOT too short, as I had read in previous reviews, comfortable and supportive and a great price. Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice/North Miami BeachAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, and I love the way these shoes look.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! They do run slightly large so bought both ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They do run slightly large so bought both a 8.5 and a 9 when ordering and ended up returning the 9. Very easy to wear
customer_reviews.author: Courtney firth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great looking.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable. I think they are durable and will last through many seasons. Timberland boots fit really well and I am happy they come in widths.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Truncellito

customer_reviews.title: They aren't  the originals.
customer_reviews.text: They look fake to me.. from one side the suture didn't get to the end and they were way to big. I went to buy them at a local store and the same size was perfect. Shipment was good though. I returned them waiting for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Pink Tims!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots!! They are so comfortable I have stood in them for three hours straight I was so well supported and my feet didn't hurt at all. I get so many compliments on them everybody wants a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Shots

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of brown low Timberland boots for many years. They were terrific. Finally needed a new pair and ordered these, even though I could not get a dark brown color. Very disappointed in these. They are much heavier than the old ones, the side of the front portion of the boot rubs against my large toe joint, the collar around the left heel is abrasive against my shin. I was delayed in starting to wear them, so cannot return them now. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth44

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are very stylish and yet durable hiking boots. I hope that the boots relax a little once you start wearing them. Right now they are a little stiff. The color is beautiful and I'm happy with this product, I just hooe the leather loosens up as I wear them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes, lovely soft color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes, lovely soft color, easy to tie, great fit, as my 25 year old Timberlands were getting worn out, these will replace them. They are, however, much heavier than my old ones, but with a thicker sole. Breaking them in for hiking now, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Saray Nagendra

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These booties are cute and sturdy. They are so hard that they take a little getting used to, but they’ve been great in the snowy and icy weather we’ve been having. They accommodate thick warm socks well and I have wide/fat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: It may not be so comfortable for a lot of walking
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than the ones I bought many years ago. The tongue is not padded either. It may not be so comfortable for a lot of walking. Disappointed that the delivery people choose to ignore my request for delivering to the rear porch. The package was not totally hidden on my front porch and was visible to the street.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy, and still looks fashionable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice, a good fit, and comfortable. Didn't require any breaking in, and I've been wearing them for 8 hours a day with no problem. They do easily look scuffed up against the black fabric but it's easily cleaned. There's very little in the way of support so be sure to have shoe inserts ready. Other than that, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alane Chen

customer_reviews.title: good boots but the pink is not a nice vibrant pink
customer_reviews.text: these are good I just wish that the pink color was a little less brownish and more pinkish. I love the Nellie style. this is my 2nd pair of these .
customer_reviews.author: Confused buyer

customer_reviews.title: The best! Seriously
customer_reviews.text: Favorite boots ever! I wear them everyday and my feet love them. I recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Emirelda Grey

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pair of shoes. Just know what to expect.
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice! The leather is very stiff at first so it might take a few ankle bruises before they become super comfortable. I was a bit surprised with how heavy they are, but after you look at the amount of rubber and leather used you just come to accept it. The grip is honestly not that great. Wet floors are especially slippery with these on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots originally for snow/mud.. I’ve had them about a week now and they are so comfortable. Usually my toes feel cramped in boots but these have plenty of room and the tread is great for snow/mud, every day wear
customer_reviews.author: anna lobdell

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these because it was not wide enough- which is weird because all of my shoes are US 9- I never have to get wide so idk
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: Timberland never goes out of style.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Timberland fan and especially love this style of boot. I admit to also liking Red Wings, the basic work boot look and functionality. I bought these for cold, wet days ahead and also for how they look with jeans. I have similar ones in black. I found these boots to be true to size, a bit wide and roomy in the toebox, but for me, that is good as I have a wider foot and there is plenty of room for thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Azar

customer_reviews.title: Snagged them for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave my Wheat Yellow Timberland Nellie's a 4 star is because the right shoe had a slight crease in it. Not too noticeable at first glance. There were not any stains or scratches other than that. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: I dot now know whether is it real or not. I just wear 3 times. There is two scratchers and easy to get dirty. When I use wipe, the color is fading.
customer_reviews.author: Kong Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Decent boots for the Dollars
customer_reviews.text: The product was true to the description. The leather boot leather tonguevwas a bit stiff but should soften in time. I will use these boots to work around the yard for heavy duty yard/ landscaping projects where support and no protection are a must.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They're much more comfy than I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They're much more comfy than I had expected. They get dirty easy and quick but they're for work so no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable and look very stylish. The price was good compared to others. Great shipping time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise P.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I'll never be a fan of timberland boot. Just too heavy for my liking not to mention the friction of the insole. Got to think about donating it now.
customer_reviews.author: KFoster

customer_reviews.title: Wider toe than expected.
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little wider than my other (leather) timbs. I had to double check to make sure I hadn't ordered a boy/men shoe. I guess I'll get used to them, with thicker socks.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi M.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof? Where?
customer_reviews.text: So, I just put in a return of these boots because, while they say they are waterproof, I have worn them now a total of four times and on the right shoe there is DISTINCT water damage and the suede is starting to deteriorate. Now keep in mind, this is just after walking outside for a bit in normal enviornmental conditons. I hope it was just a defect with these because I am so sad. I mean the droplet you see there is from me washing my hands at work and a drop getting on the suede. I just can't believe these $95 shoes didn't even last a month!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots fit well but laces are cheap and too short
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with the look and fit. The shoe laces however are very stiff and way too short. I had to tie a tiny bow and could not double tie them. I will need to buy some good boot laces to replace the ones the boots came with. Other than that they are nice boots.
customer_reviews.author: colleenfwx

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Comfortable, durable, look great. Nice and heavy. I think they would fit true to size if worn with wool socks, or something else sort of padded and thick, but if you're planning on wearing them with thin 'fashion socks' they run maybe half a size too large. Still totally manageable if laced up tight, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine1967

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: True to size for me! After reading the reviews I ordered a size up and had to return and order my regular size. Very comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Denisleydis Denis

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable boot .
customer_reviews.text: Like the look, received multiple compliments. Timberland it’s not for comfort. To hard on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sway

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great for trekking through snow and rain. They keep my feet dry and they're so cute! My only dislike is that they definitely run large. I am a true size 7 in women's and ordered a size 7. They fit more like a 7.5 and I almost had to return them. I figured that since they're a winter boot for me, I'd wear them with fuzzy or thick socks to add some extra comfort...so it worked out in the end. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fake timbs. Way too large anyways. Came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Fake timbs. Way too large anyways. Came with one shoelace longer than the other and no leather tag on the side of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: alissa anne 🍒

customer_reviews.title: They look soooooo good.
customer_reviews.text: I truly love them, they're super appealing and is fun to see Timberland "aficionados" looking, gawking or checking them out with the corner of the eye. It take a few wears to get them to feel comfortable and is best if worn with thin socks because they kind of feel a bit tight. I strongly recommend going for half a size higher instead of the actual size... if you're an 8 then go for 8.5 (if available).
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Timberland boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots - very comfortable and durable in the bad weather. For some reason the shoelaces were frayed when I received these new boots but it really isn't that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe look very nice but it is really heavy and I get a pain in my ankle after wearing it. Definitively not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Kadiekay

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but missing leather tag
customer_reviews.text: I just received the boots. It is missing the leather tag it’s supposed to come with. I think it might not be an original timberland boots. Other than that, the boots itself is at their right size and looks perfect. I think I will just keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are authentic timberlands. Definitely glad I sized up and purchased width. No much cushion in the bedding so I will need insoles for comfort. I wear a 9 and I purchased a 10w.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and look so good on I bought another pair in grey and like those even more
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered regular size. Boots are so stiff and clunky. After several hours of wearing, make feet and lower legs feel completely heavy and painful.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marvin

product_meta.title: Timberland Women's Nellie Double Waterproof Ankle Boot
product_meta.description:
Waterproof Chukka double boot.Padded collar.Direct-attach.

Timberland set new industry standards for craftsmanship, durability and protection when it introduced an authentic, waterproof leather boot in 1973. A global leader in design, engineering and marketing of premium footwear, Timberland values consumers who cherish the outdoors and their time in it. Timberland has been an industry leader in the use of both sustainable and recycled materials in its shoes, as well as its footwear packaging. The Timberland Company believes in corporate responsibility and supports numerous civic and social projects throughout the year.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC STYLE: Our comfy, customer-favorite Nellie boots are the perfect blend of rugged and feminine. Styled with everything from skirts to ripped jeans, wear these waterproof boots year-round. Featuring premium full-grain waterproof leather uppers.

NOT JUST FOR THE TRAIL: Whether you're trekking the mountains or hiking downtown streets, Timberland has the styles you'll love to wear. From ankle boots & sneaker boots to sandals & boat shoes, Timberland will keep you on your feet & looking fabulous.

TIMBERLAND BOOTS are synonymous with quality workmanship. Whether you're looking for mens boots, womens boots, or kids boots, Timberland has you covered. For the best in hiking boots, rain boots, work boots, casual shoes & boots & more, choose Timberland.

WHAT YOU NEED IN THE OUTDOORS: Timberland isn't just for high-quality mens, womens, and kids boots. We have the gear you need for all your outdoor adventures, including jackets and coats for outdoor activities, backpacks and luggage & outdoor accessories.

THE BEST IN OUTDOORS: See how Timberland's line of outdoor wear stacks up to hiking boots, casual shoes, and street boots from brands like Keen, Lucky, Toms, Dansko, Doc Martens, Uggs, Skechers, Vionic, Maelstrom, Justin, Hunter, Bogs, Nike, or Sorel.
